publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-363 Pauline McNeill: Dumbarton Road Corridor Environmental Trust—That the Parliament congratulates Dumbarton Road Corridor Environmental Trust Ltd on its successful application to the Big Lottery Fund for a Community Growing Assets grant and notes the sustained hard work done by many local individuals and organisations in the Scotstoun area of Glasgow to secure for the community a new facility which will act as both a community space for Scotstoun and a centre for the development of local peoples’ skills in conjunction with Anniesland and Clydebank colleges. Supported by: Ken Macintosh*, Kenneth Gibson*, Trish Godman*, Des McNulty*, Jackie Baillie*, Hugh Henry*, Bob Doris*, Christopher Harvie*, Sandra White*
